title: Steam Chromebook
description: Would you buy a gaming Chromebook?  2022 Apple Event Leaks:  Galaxy S22 is Boring:  Steam Deck Doesn't Suck:  Android is BROKEN - Google Pixel 6:  Did Microsoft Break Gaming?   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Do your joke 0:40 Who uses Chromebooks? 1:01 Steam heading to Linux 1:54 RTX on Chrome OS? 3:30 HOW MUCH?!?! 4:07 Is RTX even worth it? 5:01 A 3060 in a Chromebook? 5:35 Blast from the past 5:45 Can Chrome OS Compete? 6:40 Possible display specs 7:05 Gaming Chromebooks are coming 7:26 These are NOT gonna be cheap 7:58 Is it better than Windows yet? 8:26 This makes sense for nVidia 9:00 We are sleeping on Chrome OS 9:40 What do you think?!
